name: Unbound
description: The very solar system is at your fingertips as you fight for  the survival of the human race, for fortune, and for glory.  Delve deep into the different planets throughout the solar  system and fight various races of aliens and other menacing  foes. Blending the elements of classic action rpg games with  the freedom of randomly generated sandbox-style creativity,  Unbound is a unique gaming experience where both the journey  and the destination are as unique as the player themselves.
